Package com.example.chicksevent.fragment_org

Class UpdateEventFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.chicksevent.fragment_org.UpdateEventFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class UpdateEventFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment that displays and allows navigation from an event update screen. This fragment serves as event editing functionality.

      Parameters:
      editText - The EditText to update with the selected date

    • showDatePickerWithTime

      private void showDatePickerWithTime(android.widget.EditText dateEditText, android.widget.EditText timeEditText, android.widget.Spinner amPmSpinner, String title)
      Shows a DatePickerDialog and then automatically shows a TimePickerDialog after date selection. This allows users to select both date and time in sequence from the calendar.
      Parameters:
      dateEditText - The EditText to update with the selected date
      timeEditText - The EditText to update with the selected time
      amPmSpinner - The spinner for AM/PM selection
      title - The title for the date picker dialog

    • showTimePicker

      private void showTimePicker(android.widget.EditText editText, android.widget.Spinner amPmSpinner)
      Shows a TimePickerDialog and updates the EditText with the selected time in HH:MM format.
      Parameters:
      editText - The EditText to update with the selected time
      amPmSpinner - The spinner for AM/PM selection

    • generateAndSaveQRCode

      private void generateAndSaveQRCode(String eventId, String eventName)
      Generates a QR code for the event and saves it to local storage and Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the event ID to encode in the QR code
      eventName - the event name to include in the filename
